attributes.action: Lower taxes on fresh organic foods NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people cannot afford to eat healthily, as a result of this children growing up in poorer families are not being given the healthiest start in life, which can lead to problems and illnesses later on in life as well as bad eating habits.
Lower prices would make a healthier lifestyle more realistically accesable to these people.
This is what is needed to cut obesity rates and will also cut NHS bills emensly in the long run.
